channel.title: DTO
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from DTO, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Here's why Nvidia, Broadcom and other AI stocks are falling sharply today
Nasdaq sharply lower in final hour as tech sells off; Dow, S&P also down — live
FCC chief Brendan Carr tells Senate that his agency is 'not formally ... independent'
item.description: FCC chairman Brendan Carr testified to a congressional committee for the first time since ABC suspended Jimmy Kimmel's show following a Carr threat.

item.title: 10 of the most loved dividend stocks for 2026
Trump tariffs: Small businesses take on high-interest rate loans to cover new costs
item.description: Even if the Supreme Court rules Trump tariffs are illegal, high interest rates and fees on predatory loans are leaving some businesses facing years of...

item.title: FBI Deputy Director Dan Bongino plans to step down early next year: MS NOW
item.description: Bongino had been selected by President Donald Trump for the high-profile law enforcement job despite him having no prior FBI experience.

item.title: Epstein accomplice Ghislaine Maxwell petitions to vacate sex crime conviction
item.description: The habeas petition by Ghislaine Maxwell comes two day before a deadline for the Department of Justice to release files about Jeffrey Epstein.

item.title: Micron earnings blow past expectations — and the stock is climbing
Dow, S&P 500 end lower for 4th straight day, as tech drags Nasdaq down sharply
